# Captive Typescript configuration _(@captive/browserslist-config)_
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

[![NPM Version][package-version-svg]][package-url]
[![License][license-image]][license-url]

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (PKGJSON:template=> ${description}&unknownTxt= ) -->
> Browserslist shared configuration
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

## Installation

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (PKGJSON:template=```console\nnpm install --save-dev ${name}\n```) -->
```console
npm install --save-dev @captive/browserslist-config
```
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

## Usage

In the `package.json` for your project

```json
{
  "browserslist": [
    "extends @captive/browserslist-config"
  ]
}
```

## Alternative configuration

- `@captive/browserslist-config/development` : Only some common browsers (for development)
